title: WOW! 20 ft. ceiling! 1BR + LOFT w/ Gas Fireplace & W/D in Unit!
posting_body: ['Contentment meets refinement in the waterfront apartment homes of Foster City.', 'Plan 1C  1 \xa0bed / 1 bath / 974 Sq.', 'Ft / From $3,867  * Unit 316 - Available 08/05/22', 'Miramar Apartments', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Address:', '1288 East Hillsdale Blvd.', 'Foster City, CA 94404', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'x785', 'Property Description', 'You’ll love how vibrant and spacious this one-bedroom, one-bathroom home is at Miramar Apartments, a luxury neighborhood near Foster City Lagoon.', 'This home has a spacious living room that opens to a private patio.', 'Vaulted ceilings in select apartments enhance interiors.', 'Near the dining area, you have a kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances and granite countertops.', 'A walk-in closet in the bedroom satisfies your storage needs.', 'A spiral staircase leads to a huge loft with a closet.', 'High-speed Internet access is available.', 'Miramar Apartments has amenities designed to cater to active individuals, such as a fitness center and a heated pool.', 'Waterfront walkways allow for relaxing strolls with pets.', 'Neighbors who are into sports and recreation have the boat dock and kayak rentals to enjoy.', 'Commuters appreciate the easy access to the 101 and 92 Freeways.', 'Contact the leasing office today for the latest in pricing and availability.', 'Floor Plan/Unit Features', '*
